cover.title: Bedtime
cover.categories: Product Design, Visual Design, UI, UX

header: Bedtime is an mobile app I created to spread kindness across the internet. Send and receive goodnight messages from strangers all around the world.

text: From our earliest years, we’re conditioned to say kind things to our loved ones before going to sleep. With Bedtime I wanted to leverage that behavior to create a safe place for strangers to say goodnight to one another. Why strangers? Because it’s weird. And oddly comforting in a restoring-faith-in-humanity kind of way.
To welcome a stranger into your room and whisper goodnight to them is a powerful thing.
